Articles.Content: I have an awful lot of crafts in my save, and it's becoming increasingly tedious to sort through five or ten minor variants of the exact same craft, is there a mod that adds a folder or sorting functionality of some sort to the saved crafts list?
You might try CraftManager:

Do you ever really want to find them again? I just make a folder called "more_ksp_stuff" on my disk and copy/move all the craft files into there. If you give them a descriptive craft name, then they are even easy to find again.

I second @HebaruSan.  The craft manager pictures are bigger, and you can create tags for the ships and then filter those tags. So, have a ton of landers, but only want to search through your aircraft?  You can do so.  It's a fantastic mod.  It also integrates with KerbalX (same developer) so uploading and downloading is easy as well.
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.
